mapper.insert: insert into Aud_Expense (ExpenseSheetID, ExpenseName, ExpenseSheetCode, SheetUserID, SheetTime, ProjectID, OrganizationID, Money, daxie, Reason, VoucherCount, PassTime, SheetStatus) values (#{expensesheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expensename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expensesheetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheetuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sheettime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organizationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daxie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vouchercount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheetstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update Aud_Expense set ExpenseName = #{expensename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExpenseSheetCode = #{expensesheetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SheetUserID = #{sheetuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SheetTime = #{sheettime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OrganizationID = #{organizationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, daxie = #{daxie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VoucherCount = #{vouchercount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PassTime = #{passtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SheetStatus = #{sheetstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ExpenseSheetID = #{expensesheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ExpenseSheetID, ExpenseName, ExpenseSheetCode, SheetUserID, SheetTime, ProjectID, OrganizationID, Money, daxie, Reason, VoucherCount, PassTime, SheetStatus from Aud_Expense where ExpenseSheetID = #{expensesheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
